title: Untitled
marks:
Inscription

in plate in black: [Annibale Carrac
description: Madonna seated on a pedestal with a book in PL hand; Child Jesus standing between legs; John the Baptist at her side leaning toward child; man standing at left foreground holding cup in PR hand and scroll in PL hand; woman at right leaning against pedestal looking up; pedestal has central oval cartouche with man playing lyre and cherub behind; winged faces at top and bottom of oval
